snippet.title: Welcome To The Dreamscape - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the official reveal trailer for the upcoming video game Welcome To The Dreamscape by Conner Rush, creator of FYRE Games.  Welcome To The Dreamscape is a story driven, first person, puzzle game about trying to learn about your past through your own dreams, but, not all is as it seems.  Journey through the amazingly odd world of your own mind and piece together your story.  Welcome To The Dreamscape is releasing late 2017 or early 2018, but there is currently a demo downloadable now for free.

Download The Demo For Free Now On...
itchio: https://fyre-games.itch.io/welcome-to-the-dreamscape-demo
GameJolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/welcome-to-the-dreamscape-demo/266604

Download Our Previous Game, Into The Unknown, On...
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/553130/Into_The_Unknown/?snr=1_7_7_151_150_1
itchio: https://fyre-games.itch.io/into-the-unknown
GameJolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/into-the-unknown/176057

Watch the Teaser Trailers & More...
Five: https://youtu.be/wFwqIS1S_F0
Four: https://youtu.be/4dvD5KTiXx4
Three: https://youtu.be/3jAlfv3Ii6c
Two: https://youtu.be/78qjxKji86Y
One: https://youtu.be/uOI9Jbr7vO0
Into The Unknown Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4KAACYlLx10
